targets.query: SELECT 100 - last("usage_idle") FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("free"), last("used") FROM "autogen"."mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("MEM_DELTHR"), last("MEM_LOGICAL_AGER") FROM "autogen"."altibase" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("LOCK_HOLD_COUNT") AS "lock_hold_count", last("LOCK_WAIT_COUNT") AS "lock_wait_count" FROM "autogen"."altibase" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT last(*) FROM "autogen"."altibase_srv_thr" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
